item.title: Lock
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

[quote=“error.login, post:9, topic:180399”][quote author=Ixl Adds Ixl link=topic=241697.msg2045765#msg2045765 date=1202702117]

and adds why would goatee get the web developer award? he pointed you out to a site… (btw change your right nav to a login section because who needs 2 navi sections?)

Because for a person who isn’t a web developer he sure knows more then hes suppose to! Also I was thinking about that too for a login, but I don’t know how to make a login yet :(. No php experience yet lol. But I’ll learn it sometime soon or later.
[/quote]
if you look around most of the mitb members know alot about web design. take ThatOneServer he knows quite alot about web design and hes got no award.

““OFFTOPIC”” wtf the .50cal is huge ““OFFTOPIC””[/quote]
I am not that great at design. I am good at web programming, but not that great at design, cause I fail at photoshop and creativity.

But when people make me shit to make for them in photoshop, i get it right on.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:4, topic:180399”]You should have three main colours, not two.

Look on deviantart for some absolutely amazing interfaces to inspire you.

DeviantArt

Browse Web Interfaces | Designs & Interfaces | DeviantArt

Web interfaces and designs, finished and un-finished.

dude! you should get a web developer award in my opinion. You probably got like a million more tips awaiting for me lol.
